TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OlsLinearRegressionTrainer extends Microsoft.ML.Training.TrainerEstimatorBase`2<class Microsoft.ML.Data.RegressionPredictionTransformer`1<class Microsoft.ML.Trainers.HalLearners.OlsLinearRegressionModelParameters>, class Microsoft.ML.Trainers.HalLearners.OlsLinearRegressionModelParameters>
Public NotInheritable Class OlsLinearRegressionTrainer Inherits TrainerEstimatorBase(Of RegressionPredictionTransformer(Of OlsLinearRegressionModelParameters), OlsLinearRegressionModelParameters)

Docs.remarks: Ordinary least squares (OLS) is a parameterized regression method. It assumes that the conditional mean of the dependent variable follows a linear function of the dependent variables. The parameters of the regressor can be estimated by minimizing the squares of the difference between observed values and the predictions.
